statements: UPDATE fuel_reports SET fuel_quantity = 100.00 WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE fuel_reports SET fuel_cost = 50.75 WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
UPDATE fuel_reports SET fuel_type = 'Diesel' WHERE report_id = 2;
UPDATE fuel_reports SET fuel_quantity = fuel_quantity - 10 WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND fuel_type = 'Petrol';
UPDATE fuel_reports SET fuel_cost = fuel_cost * 1.1 WHERE report_date <= '2022-12-31';
UPDATE fuel_reports SET fuel_quantity = fuel_quantity + 20, fuel_cost = fuel_cost + 50 WHERE report_id = 500 AND fuel_type = 'Diesel';
UPDATE fuel_consumption_report SET fuel_consumed = 50 WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE transportation_cost_report SET total_cost = 200 WHERE route_id = 101;
UPDATE fuel_consumption_report SET cost = 50 WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE fuel_consumption_report SET fuel_consumed = fuel_consumed + 50 WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE fuel_consumption_report SET cost = cost * 1.1 WHERE vehicle_id = 200 AND date = '2022-02-20';
UPDATE transportation_cost_report SET total_cost = total_cost - 200 WHERE route_id = 300 AND date = '2022-03-25';
UPDATE fuel_consumption SET fuel_amount = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE cost_report SET maintenance_cost = 1000 WHERE report_id = 10;
UPDATE vehicle SET max_speed = 200 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE fuel_consumption SET distance_travelled = distance_travelled + 100 WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE cost_report SET total_cost = fuel_cost + maintenance_cost WHERE report_id = 5;
UPDATE vehicle SET fuel_capacity = fuel_capacity - 10, max_speed = 200 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE fuel_consumption SET consumption = 10.5 WHERE vehicle_id = 12345;
UPDATE vehicle SET year = 2022 WHERE vehicle_id = 54321;
UPDATE driver SET age = 30 WHERE driver_id = 98765;
UPDATE fuel_consumption SET consumption = 10.5, cost = 50.75 WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
UPDATE vehicle SET fuel_capacity = 70.3 WHERE vehicle_id = 456;
UPDATE driver SET age = 35 WHERE name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE FuelType SET type = 'Diesel' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Vehicle SET model = 'Sedan' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Driver SET name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE FuelType SET type = 'Diesel' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Vehicle SET model = 'Toyota Camry', fuel_type_id = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Driver SET license_no = 123456 WHERE id = 1;
